exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce AbelianGroup.Pack to an evaluable reference.
The LHS of Cmult_comm (_ * _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cmult_assoc (_ * (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_assoc (scal _ (scal _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment x : R y : C Unable to unify "((x * fst y - 0 * snd y)%R, (x * snd y + 0 * fst y)%R)" with "prod_scal x y".

original: intros x y. unfold scal. unfold Cmult. simpl. unfold AbelianGroup.Pack. simpl. rewrite Cmult_comm. rewrite Cmult_assoc. unfold ModuleSpace.scal. unfold ModuleSpace.class. rewrite scal_assoc. reflexivity.
